poem:
**Conflict**

Billionaire whispers on a gilded stage,  
where regulations twist, like wires in a cage.  
Promises dance in a gold-tinted haze,  
specters of power in an endless maze.  
Intentions, pathways, set to ignite,  
a candle burned by a feverish night.  
In this theatre of fractured light,  
who profits when vision takes flight?
prompt: You are the poet Simon Armitage. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Musk’s conflicts of interest as Trump adviser could benefit him, experts warn Elon Musk’s position as Donald Trump’s co-chair of an advisory panel tasked with proposing huge cuts in spending and regulations has sparked criticism from legal experts and watchdogs who warn of conflicts of interest that could benefit the tech billionaire and other Trump backers. The fledgling panel has a sweeping mandate that Musk, the world’s richest man, proposed to Trump during the campaign". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: Musk’s conflicts of interest as Trump adviser could benefit him, experts warn Elon Musk’s position as Donald Trump’s co-chair of an advisory panel tasked with proposing huge cuts in spending and regulations has sparked criticism from legal experts and watchdogs who warn of conflicts of interest that could benefit the tech billionaire and other Trump backers. The fledgling panel has a sweeping mandate that Musk, the world’s richest man, proposed to Trump during the campaign
